name: Artifact Form Saver
author: Isaac & Chevas Balloun - Artifact LLC

sections.description: Never let your users lose the information they were typing into forms on your site. This lightweight plugin will automatically save the information they are typing in their browser’s local storage, even if they don’t submit the form. Information will save even if they turn off their computer. Activating this plugin will add Form Saver to every <form>. If you only want to include it on certain forms or other customizations, reach out to us. We deliver quick, custom, solutions. https://artifact.tools/contact/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/artifact-form-saver directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Q: What if I only want this on one page?
A: If you only want to include it on certain forms or other customizations, reach out to us. We deliver quick, custom, solutions. https://artifact.tools/contact/

short_description: This plugin will automatically save the information they are typing in their browser's local storage, even if they don't submit the form.
